title: The Puzzle Of The Sacrificial Second Princess – The Hostage Princess Receives A Warm Welcome As A Talented Person In The Enemy Country~
alternative_title: Ikenie Daini Koujo no Konwaku - Hitojichi no Himegimi, Tekikoku de Chi no Saien to shite Daikangei wo Ukeru ; Ikenie Daini Koujo no Konwaku ; The Bewilderment of the Sacrificial Second Princess ; The Bewilderment of the Sacrificial Second Princess: Married Into the Enemy Country as a Hostage Princess, but Was Strangely Welcomed With Open Arms ; The Puzzle of the Sacrificial Second Princess
status: Ikenie Daini Koujo no Konwaku - Hitojichi no Himegimi, Tekikoku de Chi no Saien to shite Daikangei wo Ukeru ; Ikenie Daini Koujo no Konwaku ; The Bewilderment of the Sacrificial Second Princess ; The Bewilderment of the Sacrificial Second Princess: Married Into the Enemy Country as a Hostage Princess, but Was Strangely Welcomed With Open Arms ; The Puzzle of the Sacrificial Second Princess
description:
Description :
        Claire, the second princess of the Feitnam Empire who was said to be a failure. Under a peace treaty with the enemy country, the Kingdom of Balatonia, she was sent as a hostage and went there expecting to be killed, but what was waiting for her was a warm welcome as the fiancée of the Crown Prince. She was recognised as someone with extraordinary intellect, and the people of the kingdom were longing for her!

Having finally found her place, she generously utilizes the knowledge she has accumulated so far in order to enrich the kingdom. She embarks on a reform of domestic affairs and the manufacture of paper.
